data.name: Keridwen Demo
data.detailed_description:
A fun and accessible puzzle game about an apprentice Witch overcoming challenges and finding spells to add to her spellbook.



  • Play through 90 hand crafted levels across multiple areas with their own mechanics
  • Relaxing and casual puzzle design with a gentle difficulty curve
  • Expected completion time: 1-2 hours

Accessibility Features

  • Undo moves and reset levels
  • Resizable interface options
  • Color contrast options
  • Screen reader accessible menu
  • High contrasting design and colors
  • Remappable controls
  • Adjustable movement and speed options
  • Separate volume controls for music and sound
  • Keyboard and touch supported

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
